meanings.definition: A unit of measurement equal to one trillionth of a mole.
meanings.sent1: I need just a picomole of sugar for this recipe.
meanings.sent2: The scientist measured the substance in picomoles.
meanings.sent3: The tiny ant carried a picomole of food on its back.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as small as a picomole in the vast ocean of emotions.
meanings.sent5: The picomole of salt in the soup made all the difference in taste.

meanings.definition: The amount of a substance that contains 6.022 x 10^11 molecules.
meanings.sent1: The medicine required a picomole of active ingredient.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician carefully measured the picomole of the solution.
meanings.sent3: The picomole of water in the glass seemed to disappear mysteriously.
meanings.sent4: His words hit her heart like a picomole of truth in a sea of lies.
meanings.sent5: The picomole of perfume was enough to fill the entire room with fragrance.
